ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Clouding for group travel?
ygData.msgSnippet: For group travel forget about it.  The range is so small that even manually following the bard is near impossible with lag (warping included) especially with
ygData.messageBody:
For group travel forget about it. The range is so small that even manually
following the bard is near impossible with lag (warping included)
especially with SoW. The only thing that it seems to be good for (IMHO) is
keeping the dungeon trash off the people who are meditating. And when you
are running around solo. It would be nice if Verant increased the range,
but I am sure we all know about Verant's priorities concerning bards.
/em sighs


At 05:19 PM 8/23/00 +0000, you wrote:
>Now that I can play Clouding, I tried using it while travelling
>through Firiona Vie with my Shaman husband. He SoW'd us, I played
>clouding, he auto followed and off we went. It didn't take long for
>him to lose the effect of Clouding, as it seems it's range is shorter
>than the auto follow range.
>
>Does anyone bother to use Clouding for group travel? Isn't it a pain
>(other than in small spaces like dungeons) to have to use manual
>follow to keep within range?
>
>Adagia Moonsong, 21, Druzzil Ro
